duties_responsibilities.duty: Work within a protected geographic territory to close sales, win business, and reach sales goals.
Implement a sales strategy targeting key decision makers and business owners to build a network and drive business.
Strategically cross-sell into existing accounts by putting the spotlight on new products and solutions.
Serve as a trusted advisor to clients.
Be an ambassador by spending time in the field and building beneficial relationships with Bankers and Accountants.
Develop and maintain relationships with internal groups in the territory.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
